exec: console.log("The JIRA number for the epic is:", epic_num)

request.description:
For QlikView, create one task per project: DeploymentConsole, DevHub, Hub, Installation, Management console, Monitoring, Platform overview, Plugins, Server, ServerLog Troubleshooting

The task includes investigation and fixing errors found.
Risk: UI labels differ between the latest UI build and the documentation.
Verify: Make sure that the correct UI label (approved in the resx file) is used in the documentation.

Note: Use the latest build and perform the checks on a selected area of the product to ensure that the documentation reflects the latest build. Improve the UI if needed, in agreement with UX (applies to strings, buttons and tooltips). If applicable, remember to check all versions (for example, desktop and server installation).

Risk: The screenshot in the documentation does not look like the screen from the latest build.
Verify: Make sure that:
Screen shots are up to date
Texts related to a screen shot (caption and body) are aligned with the text on the screen shot

Risk: Errors in images and diagrams.
Verify: Make sure images and diagrams are up-to-date.
Check all the landing pages for context sensitive connections, if applicable, and verify that all the items listed for the different menus correspond to what is actually available.
